Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1262 Administration, Enforcement and Penalty

EDITOR’S NOTE: Certain provisions of this chapter were not consistent with the Municipal Charter, which was adopted after the enactment of Ordinance 546B, from which this chapter is taken. These provisions were edited to conform to the Charter. 1262.01Building and Zoning Inspector; duties. 1262.02Building permits required. 1262.03Permit applications. 1262.04Zoning certificate required for conforming uses. 1262.05Zoning certificate required for nonconforming uses. 1262.06Issuance of permits and zoning certificates. 1262.07Temporary zoning certificates. 1262.08Record of zoning certificates; copies. 1262.09Failure to obtain zoning certificates. 1262.10Expiration of building permits. 1262.11Conformity with building permit and zoning certificates required. 1262.12Issuance of zoning certificates for projects requiring site plan review. 1262.13Board of Zoning Appeals; residency requirement. 1262.14Board proceedings. 1262.15Appeals. 1262.16Stay of proceedings. 1262.17Powers and duties of the Board. 1262.18Error of Building and Zoning Inspector. 1262.19Conditional uses. 1262.20Variances. 1262.21Supplementary conditions and safeguards for variances; prohibited uses. 1262.22Powers of the Board re appeals; voting requirements. 1262.23Duties of the Inspector, the Board and Council re appeals. 1262.24Schedule of fees, charges and expenses. 1262.25Complaints regarding violations. 1262.26Park and playground fees. 1262.27Land in lieu of park and playground fees. 1262.28Application for change of zoning districts; deposit. 1262.29Interjurisdictional cooperation on zoning and land use planning issues. 1262.99Penalty; equitable remedies.

CROSS REFERENCES

Board of Zoning Appeals; powers and duties - see CHTR. Secs. 9.07

Appeals from zoning decisions - see Ohio R.C. 713.11

Violation of zoning ordinances - see Ohio R.C. 713.13

Nonconforming uses - see P. & Z. Ch. 1278

Amendments - see P. & Z. Ch. 1284
